detail_desc: Four-piece set with a patterned top and shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric, and a T-shirt and trousers in cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Stud earrings in various designs. Size from 0.2 cm to 0.8 cm.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a sheen. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in printed sweatshirt fabric with a seam at the hips and gently flared, pleated skirt in woven fabric.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, raglan sleeves and buttons. Patch front pockets, a sewn-in waistband at the back and a back vent. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Loose-fitting jumper in a soft cable knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with short cap sleeves and elastication and a button placket at the top. Elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist and side pockets.
Ankle-length jersey trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured sections, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Retro-look sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Set with a T-shirt and denim shorts. Patterned T-shirt with an open chest pocket. 5-pocket denim shorts with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly. Slim fit.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight, patterned cotton jersey. Slightly wider neckline with a narrow ribbed trim, and a lace trim at the hem.
Round bag in braided paper straw with two imitation leather handles and a tab with a magnetic fastener at the top. Lined. Size approx. 8x40x40 cm.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a motif. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Biker treggings in stretch twill made from a cotton and viscose blend with a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees. Wide waist panel for optimum comfort.
Scarf in a softly draping, patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Faux fur jacket with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet side pockets. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Shorts in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Super-wide trousers in a softly draping viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave. High waist with elastication and gathers at the back and pleats at the front, side pockets, a low crotch and straight legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in jacquard-patterned jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with a hood with a pompom on top, and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Satin top with a V-neck front and back, and lace at the top.
Ankle-length trousers in imitation leather. High waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and pleats at the top. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline, short raglan sleeves and smocking around the neckline, sleeves and hem..

Derby shoes in imitation suede with pointed toes and open lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm. The shoes are made partly from recycled polyester.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers with a high, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with reflective details. Hood, zip down the front, long sleeves with ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs and a chest pocket with a taped zip. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft cotton and modal jersey with a deep neckline and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Short, fitted off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with narrow, covered elastication at the shoulders, smocking at the back and short puff sleeves.
Knee-length dress in silk with a lightly brushed finish. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover, short, wide sleeves, seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders and a smocked seam under the bust.
Baby Exclusive. Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen made from recycled polyester. Front pockets, press-studs down the front and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top, a flap with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Imitation suede inside. Size 13x28x32 cm.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Jumper in soft, fine knit lambswool with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Short, flared, pleated skirt in a checked weave made from a viscose blend with a concealed zip and metal press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lacing down the legs.
Short, wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves.
Padded footmuff with an elastic-trimmed hood, zips at the sides and a foldover opening at the cuffs. Fleece lining.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Matching detachable bow tie/tie. 5-pocket, regular fit trousers in soft brushed twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Trousers in different colours of cotton twill with a zip fly, button at the waist, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Low crotch and shaped, tapered legs with seams at the knees. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one suit in patterned fleece with a hood, zip down the front and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Detachable tail.

Soft, non-wired nursing bras in soft, stretch fabric with lined cups and a wrapover front for easier nursing access. No fasteners. The bras are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Rain coat in functional, waterproof fabric with sealed seams and a detachable hood. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and flap patch pockets with press-studs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Bodysuit in a patterned cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, fake pocket at the top and press-studs at the crotch.

Fitted blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication over the shoulders and a sweetheart neckline with gathers at the bust. Smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Long, straight-cut shirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pockets with a pleat, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Body in microfibre and lace with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. Mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs. Medium coverage at the back.
Lined, underwired bikini top with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.
Wide top in a lightly crêped, patterned viscose weave with an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with short sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.
Brogues in imitation patent leather with closed lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Tulle skirt with a print motif and a glittery elastic waistband. Satin lining.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved nursing top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Shorts with an elasticated waist panel below the tummy for added comfort.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a folded detail on the shoulders to create a defined silhouette. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif, dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Short top in patterned viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a V-neck with gathered elastication at the front for a gently draped effect.
Short corduroy skirt with a zip fly and button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
